dict.string: Access to your media library is required to manage and play audio recordings related to patient complaints or other medical data within the app.
Camera access is needed to capture images of medical reports and other relevant files for uploading and managing patient records.
Access is required to store and manage medical reports and other patient-related files securely within the app's Documents directory.
Access to the Documents folder is needed to securely store, retrieve, and manage medical reports and patient records within the app.
Location access while using the app is necessary to share the doctor's current location with patients for real-time tracking and improved services.
Microphone access is required to enable voice-to-text functionality in input fields and to record patient complaints for better medical care documentation.
Access to your photo library is needed to save images of medical reports or other patient-related files directly to your device for future reference.
Access to your photo library is required to select images of medical reports and other files for uploading and managing patient records within the app.
